Enum PokerHand

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PokerHand>
      • PokerHand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PokerHand>

    public enum PokerHand
extends java.lang.Enum<PokerHand>
    PokerHand - An enumeration of Poker hand classes along with associated identification numbers and Strings. Provides utility methods for classifying complete or partial Poker hands.

      • getPokerHand

        public static PokerHand getPokerHand(Card[] hand)
        Given a Card array (possibly with null values) classifies the current Poker hand and returns the classification.
        Parameters:
        hand - - a Poker hand represented as an array of Card objects which may contain null values
        Returns:
        classification of the given Poker hand
